column3: CO2 flux computation method ("Lin" or "Exp" for linear and exponential)
CH4 flux computation method ("Lin" or "Exp" for linear and exponential)
Error raised by instrument or during import
Standard error of soil respiration flux
Standard error of soil methane flux
Volumetric soil moisture at x cm (other CSR_SMx fields follow same format)
Temperature at x cm (other CSR_Tx fields follow same format)
Timestamp of beginning of flux observation, written YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Timestamp of end of flux observation, written YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Water table depth, positive numbers are depth
Decimal longitude of site, positive = north
Decimal latitude of site, positive = east
Raw data timestamp format, in R's `strptime()` format
Instrument timestamp timezone; usually but not always the same as CSR_TIMEZONE
Embargo flag. If this field is present data will not be released

column1: # `columns`: mapping of raw data columns to COSORE columns

column3: Optional R computation to be performed changing units, etc.
Timestamp of beginning of ancillary observation (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
Timestamp of end of ancillary observation (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
If no measurement length is provided this is set to assumed value
Number of observations removed for bad temperature values
CO2 flux high bound; values above this are removed
CO2 flux low bound; values above this are removed
CH4 flux high bound; values above this are removed
CH4 flux low bound; values above this are removed
Number of observations removed for error code
Number of observations removed for missing flux
Number of observations removed for bad timestamp
Number of observations removed for CO2 flux too high
Number of observations removed for CO2 flux too low
Number of observations removed for CH4 flux too high
Number of observations removed for CH4 flux too low
Year and month of first observation in dataset
Year and month of last observation in dataset
